title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

for Social Protection) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister social protection) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Pauric McPhillips, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Pauric McPhillips, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Social Protection, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Minister for Social Protection, with effect from 9 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

9 July, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [345] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
